member.name: P:LumiSoft.MailServer.WSqlCommand.CommandTimeout

member.name: M:LumiSoft.MailServer.mssql_API.AddDomain(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.param: Domain ID. Suggested value is Guid.NewGuid() .
member.remarks: Throws exception if specified domain already exists.

member.name: M:LumiSoft.MailServer.mssql_API.DeleteDomain(System.String)
member.param: Domain ID. Use GetDomains() to get valid values.
member.remarks: Deletes specified domain and all domain related data (users,mailing lists,routes).

member.name: M:LumiSoft.MailServer.mssql_API.GetUsers(System.String)
member.summary: Gets user list in specified domain.
member.param: Domain which user list to retrieve.To get all use value 'ALL'.

member.summary: Gets user ID from user name. Returns null if user doesn't exist.
